title: Typhoon Doksuri brings flood to Beijing/Gutter clogged? Forbidden City had no puddles for 600 years
description:
#Chinainsights#Chinaflood2023#Chinanews
Typhoon Doksuri has seriously affected China, making landfall on the eastern coast and causing extensive flooding in the southern region. Afterward, its lingering currents continued northward, bringing extreme rainfall and affecting an estimated 130 million people. More than one million people had to be evacuated in an emergency. No one expected that its landing in southern China would cause extreme rainfall thousands of miles away in places like Beijing, Tianjin, and Hebei Province. Reports by Chinese official media showed that the Forbidden City was inundated with water
